Dear Friend! \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"My name is Yuliya Atanasova. I am a Head of Testing Discipline in Montenegro. Together we will build Quality Engineering here. So I’m very glad to see you as a part of local testing team. \\nTogether we will travel through lots of interesting tasks, surf through exciting opportunities and find a way through challenges. I hope you’ll enjoy your journey in EPAM Testing Montenegro, find good friends and feel at home.\\nYou can always contact me in case you would like to share new ideas how to make Testing Community in EPAM Montenegro better and need help to find a proper opportunity to apply your skills and find yourself here. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Let’s act as a Family in achieving success and reaching global goals in EPAM Testing Montenegro. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Welcome there! \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"I am Ihar, Head of Test Automation Discipline in Montenegro. Where I, together with our community members building Quality Engineering network.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"I happy that you will spend some time studying the main information related to Test Automation. This direction has a lot of opportunities and extends borders outside locations on org specifics, by giving ability to grow and socialize, create something new, which is limited only by your imagination.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"But before it is important to understand global goals, instruments that we have and apply your skills for the right place.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please contact me in any case.\\nLet's go!
